mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USED_PRODUCT(UPRODUCT_NO, SUBJECT, NICKNAME, PRICE, INFO, UPRODUCT_CD, AREA, MAINPHOTO, PHOTO) VALUES(#{uproduct_no}, #{subject}, #{nickname}, #{price}, #{info}, #{uproduct_cd}, #{area}, #{mainphoto}, #{photo})
mapper.select: SELECT UPRODUCT_NO, SUBJECT, NICKNAME, UPRODUCT_CD, PRICE, INFO, AREA, LOCATION, MAINPHOTO, PHOTO FROM USED_PRODUCT WHERE NICKNAME NOT IN ( SELECT NICKNAME FROM MEMBER WHERE EMAIL IN ( SELECT CUTEMAIL FROM CUT WHERE EMAIL = #{email} ) ) AND NICKNAME NOT IN ( SELECT NICKNAME FROM MEMBER WHERE EMAIL IN ( SELECT EMAIL FROM CUT WHERE CUTEMAIL = #{email} ) ) ORDER BY SUBJECT
SELECT UPRODUCT_NO, SUBJECT, NICKNAME, UPRODUCT_CD, PRICE, INFO, AREA, LOCATION, MAINPHOTO, PHOTO FROM USED_PRODUCT WHERE SUBJECT LIKE #{keyword} ORDER BY SUBJECT
